title: iClone 5.51 Standard
text:

Every day we offer FREE licensed software you’d have to buy otherwise. $79.95 Giveaway of the day — iClone 5.51 Standard A real-time 3D animator for digital actors, environments and effects. User rating: 4 (100%) 0 (0%) Leave a comment 
iClone 5.51 Standard is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now iClone 5.51 Standard Terms and conditions 
iClone5 is real-time 3D animator for digital actors, environments and visual effects with drag&drop editing, powerful physics and Microsoft Kinect-ready motion capture, designed for creativity in broadcast production, education and previzualization. Discover smart interactivity between actors and props that make animation fun and logical. 
You can create in-house animations by moving the bodies in front of the Kinect Motion Capture system to produce customized motions. A powerful real-time physics engine combined with a library of physics-ready content allow for dynamic interactivity with scenes, actors and objects. iClone5 empowers students, professionals and independent filmmakers worldwide into the real-time art of 3D animation. System Requirements: 
Windows 7 SP1/ 8/ 10; Minimum: Dual core CPU or higher; 4GB RAM; 5GB free hard disk space; Display Resolution: 1024x768; Color Depth: True Color (x32); Graphics Card: NVidia Geforce GTX 400 Series/ AMD Radeon HD 5000 Series; Video Memory: 1GB RAM Publisher:
